title: BOOSTER FOUND!
body:
Just played a ranked game vs a Jayce that was obviously scripting or was getting boosted.

After the game he linked these details in chat about 20 times.

SKYPE: _Name Removed_
DISCORD: _Name Removed_

His IGN was: _Name Removed_
Clan name: _Name Removed_

Silver 3 last season, playing like a diamond or above player.

Now go infiltrate his discord and give him hell.

replies.body:
I won't go into much because **LGC Elam** already summed it up for me. We've already removed your content before for _'Naming and Shaming'_, and this case is even worse because you're calling for players to _"give him hell"_.  

If you _'Name and Shame'_ again you will be facing a temporary ban from the boards.

**Hey mate, please remove the name and personal information from this post such as the person's summoner name, club and their Skype/Discord information.** If you want to report this player go ahead and send in a support ticket at https://support.riotgames.com with the information you have gathered, take some screen shots of chat logs and etc. We don't want this to turn into a witchhunt which rarely results in positive discussion.

Here is an copy-paste from the universal boards rules referring to this:

"**Reporting Other Players**

Please don't name names. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We'll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.

Moderators will be looking for the following:

* Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
* Posts accusing others of malicious activity
* Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
* Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (thereâ€™s a report button for that)"
